data.question: What type of radiation source was used in the Powder X-ray diffraction (PXRD) data collection?
What is the purpose of using ethanol in the experimental procedure of Cr(VI) Reduction?
data.answer: Ethanol was used as a hole scavenger.

data.question: True or False: The Zn-MOF was dried in an oven at 100 oC for 24 hours to remove any solvent molecules.
What instrument was used for ζ potential measurements?
How was the content of Cr(VI) in the supernatant solution determined?
data.answer: Using DPC method through colorimetric analysis.

data.question: True or False: The adsorption capacity of NMOM for MnO4- ions was lower than that of pristine Zn-MOF.
What was the maximum adsorption capacity of pristine Zn-MOF for MnO4- ions?
What was the purpose of adjusting the pH of the reaction mixture in the Cr(VI) reduction experiment?
data.answer: To study the process of Cr(VI) reduction under controlled conditions.

data.question: True or False: The photocatalytic reduction of Cr(VI) to Cr(III) was performed under visible light irradiation.
What was the heating rate used in Thermogravimetric analysis (TGA) for all samples?
True or False: The UV-vis absorption spectra of solutions were recorded using a Perkin Elmer Spectrum 2 spectrophotometer.
What was the source used for X-ray photoelectron spectroscopic measurements?
True or False: The adsorption of MnO4- ions using Zn-MOF was studied using the Freundlich adsorption model.
What was the purpose of keeping the Zn-MOF immersed in ethanol overnight?
data.answer: To remove any solvent molecules before using it for thermal stability measurements.

data.question: True or False: The SEM images of Zn-MOF showed a crystalline structure.
What was the adsorption capacity of NMOM for MnO4- ions?
How was the photocatalyst separated out from the reaction solution in the Cr(VI) reduction experiment?
True or False: The BET surface area measurements were done at room temperature.
What was the scan rate used in the PXRD data collection?
What was the role of the free peripheral mercapto-functionality in the Zn-MOF?
data.answer: It acted as an interacting site for the foreign substrates.
